author: sky.cactus
content: EIPs GitHub page renderer has a critical vulnerability (can lead to RCE).  We *really* need someone we trust with Ruby experience who can evaluate and apply fixes to these sorts of things...

author: sky.cactus
content: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/4865 auto-merged rather than waiting for other editors to review/approve.  Can <@!683653554631868440> <@!543900561460822016> <@!425279588009246720> <@!689161464829050960> take a look so I can revert it if necessary?

author: sky.cactus
content: (it is very short/simple, I just don't like bypassing the process)

author: samwilsn
content: Should we also add common editors and OS files?

author: sky.cactus
content: I'm generally not a fan of kitchen sink gitignore files.

author: sky.cactus
content: If there are things people *actually* use related to the project I support adding them, but I dislike just throwing *everything* into a list because auditing becomes harder.
